soot.jimple.spark.geom.geomPA

Class GeomQueries

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.jimple.spark.geom.geomPA.GeomQueries

  • public class GeomQueries
extends java.lang.Object
    A powerful interface for querying points-to results in many ways. It is an extension for SPARK standard querying system.

        Parameters:

        L -
        R -
        target -
        Returns:

      • contextsGoBy

        public boolean contextsGoBy(Edge sootEdge,
                   Local l,
                   PtSensVisitor visitor)
        Answer contexts-go-by query. Usually, users specify the last K paths as the context. We call it k-CFA context. However, k-CFA is too restrictive. In contexts-go-by query, user specifies arbitrary call edge in the call graph. The query searches for all contexts induced by the specified call edge and collect points-to results under these contexts.
        Parameters:
        sootEdge: - the specified context edge in soot edge format
        l: - the querying pointer
        visitor: - container for querying result
        Returns:
        false, l does not have points-to information under the contexts induced by the given call edge

      • contexsByAnyCallEdge

      • kCFA

        public boolean kCFA(Edge[] callEdgeChain,
           Local l,
           PtSensVisitor visitor)
        Standard K-CFA querying for arbitrary K.
        Parameters:
        callEdgeChain: - last K call edges leading to the method that contains l. callEdgeChain[0] is the farthest call edge in the chain.
        l: - the querying pointer
        visitor: - the querying result container
        Returns:
        false, l does not have points-to information under the given context
